subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Achieving consensus on the science of food regulations and 
legislation to ensure the global availability of safe and 
wholesome food products for all consumers. 
 
To ensure that scientific correct messages are also correctly understood everywhere, GHI will publish> these messages in local languages, from Armenian to Zulu.
relevant_communication:
Ensuring Global Food Safety - Exploring Global Harmonization (http://store.elsevier.com/Ensuring-Global-Food-Safety/isbn-9780080889306/) 
 
Regulating Safety of Traditional and Ethnic Foods (http://store.elsevier.com/Regulating-Safety-of-Traditional-and-Ethnic-Foods/isbn-9780128006054/) 
 
Nutrition and health aspects of traditional and ethnic foods; 26 volumes - to be published from September 2018 onwards. 
 
Articles in scientific journals and food related magazines, in multiple languages and countries 
 
1st GHI World Congress on Food Safety and Security, Leiden, The Netherlands, 24-28 March 2019
